alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:26PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Beltrami and south central Lake of the Woods Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 125 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Oaks Corner, or 51 miles southeast of Roseau, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oaks Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami
